name: VR Speech Trainer
abstract: The Power of Public Speaking - The VR Speech Trainer: Gamified photo-realistic training scenarios, an authentic virtual audience, and AI-powered real-time feedback.

detail.app_release_note:
- General performance optimization
- The user interface of the entire application has been updated
- The mode selection in the options has been replaced by the "Help system" section: Instead of choosing between "Training" and "Simulation", the various help systems can now be switched on and off individually
- A logout function has been added to the main menu, allowing you to easily switch between multiple accounts
- The exit function has been moved from the main menu to the login screen
- A direct link to the license shop has been added to the login screen to provide additional assistance
- A new main menu environment has been implemented
- All avatars within the application have been graphically updated (except: Conference hall)
- The "University" presentation location has been graphically updated
- The external environment of all presentation locations has been graphically adapted
- The latest version 1.7.0 is still supported (but an update is recommended)
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo3 Pro, PICO Neo3 Eye, PICO 4E, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro
